Package skeleton2D

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bone
    This class represents a bone and its relation to the parent bone
    BoneSystem
    This class generate the hierarchy bone system
    Skeleton2D
    This algorithm is based on the paper Skeleton Extraction of 3D Objects with Visible Repulsive Force by Fu-Che Wu, Wan-Chun Ma, Ping-Chou Liou, Rung-Huei Liang and Ming Ouhyoung.
